channel.title: Projects on Phelipe Teles
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Phelipe Teles

item.title: Blog
item.description: Personal site and blog built with Hugo, vanilla JavaScript and Tailwind CSS.

item.title: Ipeadata Explorer
item.description: A React app to search and visualize time series from the Ipeadata database.

item.title: dotfiles
item.description: Reproducible desktop and development environment in Ubuntu, Fedora and macOS, managed with GNU Stow, Ansible, git submodules and other tools.

item.title: seriesbr
item.description: A Python library to get time series from databases maintained by brazilian institutions such as the BCB, IPEA and IBGE, into a pandas DataFrame.

item.title: reportforce
item.description: A Python library to download reports from Salesforce via Analytics REST API.
